metadata.title: CVE-2023-52482 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:x86/srso: Add SRSO mitigation for Hygon processors Add mitigation for thespeculative return stack overflow vulnerability which exists on Hygonprocessors too.

criterions.comment: linux-fips: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
